reviewText: Great dvd. Case cover arrived  broken inside so I had to ship it back for replacement,otherwise good instructional material. This completes my set.

Options for the arm bars and variations are amazing as well as everything else in the video.  I'm a white belt still but it helps watching these options to know what is available.  It's not in my muscle memory but in the head when I'm rolling and at a transition period.  All of his dvds are really great.
Great instructional and theory behind BJJ. Roy Dean has produced another great video. Waiting for the next one on self defense and stand up.
